dontSleep: It's not yet time to sleep! I just woke up!
1_1: Another morning - another day where I hope my coffee does the talking.
Maybe today I’ll write something brilliant… by accident.
Well, maybe I should read some headlines first before I write some news myself.
1_2: I can’t believe people are falling for this.
They say the public is becoming more and more indifferent towards culture.
If culture is dying… I refuse to let it die quietly.
waitComputer: The computer needs a moment to wake up… much like me.
waitDay1Tasks: I guess I should skim the headlines first before I try to write any news myself.
1_3: Why is his subject line always shouting at me?
window: I can see the Eiffel Tower from here. Is that why I pay too much rent?
coffeeMug: Let’s not break another coffee mug.
The fuel that keeps me running… literally.
trashBin: I should throw out the trash on my way out. Tomorrow.
lateToGo: It is too late to go out now. I already went out today.
